title: Rrena e Ministrit të Drejtësisë për buxhetin e KGjK-së e KPK-së
author: kallxo.com
vclaim: Kallxo.com provides the possibility for all Kosovo citizens to report cases of corruption, organized crime, fraud, conflicts of interest, and other cases of abuses of official capacity, neglect, inaction, infringement of rights of Kosovo citizens, or infringement of general interests
